name: Blastbot
0:
”Alexa, turn on the AC”
”Alexa, set the AC to 25 degrees”
”Alexa, turn off the lamp”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control your Blastbot devices with your voice using Amazon Alexa and this Alexa skill. This skill will let you control your AC, set the temperature, turn on and off your Blastbot Smart Switch and Blastbot Smart Plug, and execute scenes from Blastbot Cloud.

You'll need to have a Blastbot Cloud account and a compatible device previously configured via the Blastbot app.

Don't have a blastbot account? create it in?

 - web: https://cloud.blastbot.io/
 - Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=mx.makerlab.blastbot
 - iOS: https://apps.apple.com/mx/app/blastbot/id1075659553

Compatible Devices:
- Smart Control.
- Blastbot Hub.
- Blastbot Smart Plug.
- Blastbot Smart Switch (requires Blastbot Hub).
Buy yours at https://blastbot.io/pt/tienda


More information at https://blastbot.io/
